name: Fish Out
description:
Cool DJ dance floor, sweet orange, awesome vinyl record and other varity of scenes;
Clownfish, snapper and mechanical sharks, dozens of unique skins waiting you to unlock.
On a rolling planet, only need to control the jump by pressing the screen through obstacles and challenging the BOSS level.
The classic arcade game!
Try hard to get higher scores and more golds!
When you take the subway, wait for the bus, meet your friends...You can play the casual game anytime and anywhere. Has your record been renewed?
Experience the adventures on your fingers with everyone!
